column1: Smoque BBQ////I recently moved to Irving Park for the summer from Spring
column2: Texas and had to try the much hyped Smoque. It was crowded and noisy but what BBQ place isn't? The beans were terrific with good flavor
column3: the slaw excellent and the Mac and cheese very good. The brisket was moist
column4: tender and almost devoid of flavor. There didn't appear to be a rub on it
column5: just black smoke without much taste. The meat grey. It almost seemed like someone cooked it in water and finished it in a smoker. My wife
column6: who was reluctant to go with me
column8: the taste was about the same but the meat dry. Sorry but this wasn't close to the real thing.
